snippet: When Preston Miller ﬁrst picked up a tuba, he knew he had found his instrument. ‘‘It’s big, it’s loud and it’s fun,’’ he says. So is the marching band at Allen High School, the largest in the country.
lead_paragraph: When Preston Miller ﬁrst picked up a tuba, he knew he had found his instrument. ‘‘It’s big, it’s loud and it’s fun,’’ he says. So is the marching band at Allen High School, the largest in the country.
